Function Documentation

AUDACITY_DLL_API int ExecCommand ( wxString *  pIn,
wxString *  pOut 
)

This is the function which actually obeys one command. Rather than applying the command directly, an event containing a reference to the command is sent to the main (GUI) thread. This is because having more than one thread access the GUI at a time causes problems with wxwidgets.

References CommandBuilder::Cleanup(), GetActiveProject(), CommandBuilder::GetCommand(), CommandBuilder::GetErrorMessage(), Response::GetMessage(), ScriptCommandRelay::PostCommand(), ScriptCommandRelay::ReceiveResponse(), AudacityProject::SafeDisplayStatusMessage(), and CommandBuilder::WasValid().

Referenced by ScriptCommandRelay::Run().
